description: This file is a Node.js script that acts as a minimal create-react-app (CRA) build shim to ensure correct PATH handling in CI environments. It attempts to load the local react-scripts build script and provides an error message if not found.

methods.name: require
methods.description: Node.js require function used to import modules.

methods.name: require.resolve
methods.description: Method used to resolve the path of a module.

methods.name: console.error
methods.description: Outputs error messages to the console.

methods.name: process.exit
methods.description: Exits the current process with a specified exit code.
